<<<<<<< HEAD
More cheap riches, or, Heavenly aphorismes viz. a third, or rather true first part of the pocket companion compleated : being 300 golden sayings more / faithfully copied out of the manuscripts of Mr. H.C. (that eminent and faithful servant of God, many years agoe deceased) by N.C. Church, Nathanaell.
[10], 68 p.
Printed by D.M. for J. Rothwell ..., London : 1660.
Imperfect: stained, torn, cropped, and tightly bound, with print show-through and loss of print. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
